data.title: Maradona — Burlington Public Library
data.meta_description: Maradona — "Two-time Palme d'Or winning director Emir Kusturica turns his attention to a monumental, yet still enigmatic figure - Diego Maradona. This is more than just a sports documentary, this is Maradona as Kusturica sees him: the revolutionary, the footballer, the man, the God, the drug addict, the legend"--Container.
